roleset.name: to review, discuss
roleset.note: HASH_OUT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hash' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from hash.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [The House and Senate]-1 are [*-1]-2 to begin soon [*-2] hashing out an agreement for sanctions legislation .
